item.title: Get ready to pk and trade without a limit, runescape is coming back baby
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:27, topic:374479”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=470454.msg3441904#msg3441904 date=1293138067]
Not true, they have a monarchy but they don’t use there power, the parliament makes the rules…

and what does it matter if it’s bigger or not? what does that have to do with anything.
[/quote]

Either way recompiling and reverse engineering runescape is a crime anywhere in the world besides like asia and cuba

You’re right about the U.K. thing, I thought you meant the monarchy had the power

But you’re telling me it’s not a crime to reverse engineer runescape in Russia? In Japan? In Turkey? No, it’s a crime. So it does matter.[/quote]Copyrights laws arn’t enforced in some countries like china and cuba, Why do you think all runescape gold selling companies are asian?

Read full topic

item.title: Get ready to pk and trade without a limit, runescape is coming back baby
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:20, topic:374479”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=470454.msg3440238#msg3440238 date=1293048083]

Anyone here who registered on RuneScape.com is breaking there rules.

That shouldn’t be a rule though cause this is free speech
[/quote]Not in the united kingdom, they’re ruled by monarchy. Either way recompiling and reverse engineering runescape is a crime anywhere in the world besides like asia and cuba[/quote]

First off, the U.K. is not a monarchy. They’re a parliamentary democracy.

Also,

Asia != China and North Korea, it’s much bigger than those two countries.

Read full topic

item.title: Get ready to pk and trade without a limit, runescape is coming back baby
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:16, topic:374479”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=470454.msg3440218#msg3440218 date=1293046544]

[quote author=Muroth link=topic=470454.msg3440185#msg3440185 date=1293044559]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=470454.msg3440184#msg3440184 date=1293044514]

[quote author=Muroth link=topic=470454.msg3440182#msg3440182 date=1293044484]

Im a mod on RuneScape and I can tell you plain and simple that this is NOT REAL. There is no such post in our forum section, and why would it be called “Moderator private forum?” unless your stupid or something… Its hidden to regular users and it is called “Moderator/Staff Announcements”. So please stop wasting your time in photo shop to give people false hope.
[/quote]LOL, You made my day.

Its what I do
[/quote]Either add me and confirm your status or remain a fucking retard in my eyes.
Your call boss.

Don’t bother with him
[/quote]Do I win then??

Everybody knows he’s not a moderator

Don’t really care what everyone thinks, I just pointed out a flaw in his topic, I don’t live to please you all. For those of you who are going to go “Oh thats cause he really isn’t!” then you have to be the stupidest person on this site cause rule number one for player moderators is to not affiliate with any Private Emulation or Real World trading sites. So why would I give out my name?
[/quote]If you go by your rules then don’t come to this site, applying one rule and not doing the same to another makes a Moderator a dick.[/quote]
That may be true but breaking a rule that is unjust is what humans are support to do in order to create a society that can improve itself. I was stating the rule to show why I do not wish to tell you all my name, cause in my thoughts for being on the internet the big rule is never trust anyone.

Read full topic

So why would I give out my name?[/quote]If you go by your rules then don’t come to this site, applying one rule and not doing the same to another makes a Moderator a dick.
